name: Userstyles.org - another update of Super Style
description: This is a modification of style 44215 (which in turn was a modification of style 19082). I have not done much, although I have added a few tweaks. These include a slightly different background (using CSS3 gradients), a semitransparent search section and visible "Contact the admin." link. I have also fixed the issues with the like buttons having the same background as the page.
